rules_text:
[i]Daien Tactician[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may tap an artifact you control. If you do, tap up to two target creatures.
[i]Dragon Form [/i]– {5}{U}{R}: Discover 6, then transform Ena. [i](To discover 6, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 6 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
